body:
## What happened

attempted to open my build.gradle file in a new window for editing in Android Studio

## Version information

Android Studio `3.6.2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 45.0.1` • Dart plugin `192.7761`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

null

```

	at com.intellij.openapi.actionSystem.impl.ActionMenuItem.fireActionPerformed(ActionMenuItem.java:111)
	at com.intellij.ui.plaf.beg.BegMenuItemUI.doClick(BegMenuItemUI.java:524)
	at com.intellij.ui.plaf.beg.BegMenuItemUI.access$300(BegMenuItemUI.java:35)
	at com.intellij.ui.plaf.beg.BegMenuItemUI$MyMouseInputHandler.mouseReleased(BegMenuItemUI.java:546)
```

comment_data.body:
Looks like a dup of #4233. 

Check your class path. An outdated version of Android Studio is probably causing an old version of the gradle plugin to be loaded.

title: IDE Error opening build.gradle file in Android Studio
